thread.title: Great location and wonderful service
thread.title_full: Great location and wonderful service - Review of Egerton House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: judyanne
title: Great location and wonderful service
text:
We stay recently for a family wedding and had a lovely stay. The hotel is in such a good position with shops and restaurants right on your doorstep but in a quite side road. Our room was clean and spacious, with a very comfy bed. Breakfast were delicious with plenty of choice. The staff were all very friendly and extremely helpful. We will certainly be back.
Room Tip: Our room on the front, number 23 had a lovely bay window with seating area. See more room tips
